subject: URGENT: Client escalation needs immediate response
body: Critical issue with deployment. The production system is down and we need your immediate attention. Please respond ASAP.

subject: Meeting request: Q4 Planning
body: Can we meet next week to discuss Q4 strategy? I'm thinking Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon would work. Let me know your availability.

subject: FYI: Weekly report
body: Here is this week's progress report. All projects are on track. No action needed, just keeping you informed.

subject: Action Required: Budget approval needed
body: The Q4 budget proposal requires your approval by end of day today. Please review the attached document and let me know if you have any questions.

subject: Re: Project timeline discussion
body: Thanks for the update. I have a few questions about the timeline. Can we schedule a quick 30-minute call to discuss? Available tomorrow morning or Friday afternoon.
